name: Hard Life: Dev Edition
description:
Made by myself on Construct 3, for the Major Jam 4.

A game so hard, you have to use the console command to hope having a chance !

Don't worry if you have a black screen, it takes a few seconds to load, maybe more if you have a slow connection / PC.

Quick demonstration

Commands :
Click / touch the actions icons, then the play button to validate.
² / C / Double-tapping : Open the console.
M : Mute the game.
Numpad + / - : Respectively increase / decrease the volume.

Credits :
The game design and scripting has been done by me.
All visual assets are either made by me or bought.
All musics are bought.
All sounds come from www.freesound.org; attrition license to JoelAudio, jtn191, ryusa, SilverIllusionist & SoundFlakes.
